item.title: Content creation is boring as hell, so I built an app
item.description: Project showcase for a desktop app I built to help with my painting hobby

item.title: Automatically clean up your Jupyter Notebooks with Jupyter Black
item.description:
One of my biggest gripes about Jupyter Notebooks is that it’s so EASY to write dirty and messy code.

Every other IDE has some kind of autoformatter to speed up cleaning your code like in Pycharm and VS Code but Jupyter? No. At least by default No.

Thankfully there’s this extension called Jupyter black – basically when you have it set up it automatically formats a code cell as soon as you run it just like that

item.title: Hello World

Hello world

First post. Settled with Hugo after testing out different static site generators – the themes are way prettier than anything I’ve tried so I’m going with this one.
